original_title: Benny Goodman - Adventures In The Kingdom Of Swing
overview: This biography of musical legend Benny Goodman contains testimonials from various contemporaries and scholars, and offers several clips of the man in performance. Nearly two-dozen songs can be heard including "California, Here I Come," "A Fine Romance," "Why Don't You Do Right," "I've Got a Heart Full of Music," and "Bugle Cal Rag."
title: Benny Goodman - Adventures In The Kingdom Of Swing
